attributes.action: make the queen honour the chuckle brothers with an KBE in her next honours list.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chuckle Brothers are part of all our lives. Their BBC show ChuckleVision having has been running since 1987, celebrated its 20th anniversary on 26 September 2007, causing it to have been part of peoples childhood from those who are still 6 years old to those who are in their late 20s . I for one still remember the days of watching it with Dan and the chucklemobile. The aim of this petition is to get this honour their contrebution to british culture. They are uniquely british. They are a british institution so lets get them the place in the culture history of modern britian that they deserve.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
